__e: There is some human blood in my family line.
But you can change that. Human blood gives you that.
But the only way he could sustain that life was by drinking blood.

"We declare our right on this earth to be a man to be a human being to be given the rights of a human being to be respected as a human being in this society on this earth in this day which we intend to bring into existence--"
To be treated like a human being, like a woman. Not like some baby girl, which is obviously how he still sees you. - Am I right?
All I know is that first you've got to get mad!
No! You're so afraid of losing me that you've convinced yourself that you can endure a human life.
Since I discovered that I am going to have to take charge of another human being's life!
I mean, you know how much I wanted a human life with you, being human myself, being normal... that's something I've wanted since long before I met you.

The control of feelings, so that they do not control you. You suggest that I should be completely Vulcan, and yet, you married a human. As ambassador to Earth, it is my duty to observe and understand human behavior.
I thought you were the man who understood human behavior.
It taught me everything I need to know about the human condition.
Once you have a human heart, it's almost impossible to control the monster inside.
But from the very first moment that we met you reminded me of what it felt like to have my human heart.
It stopped when I got my soul back. My human heart.
We haven't ruled out driver error.
It's always a human error, doctor, whichever way you turn it.
I know you'll chalk this up to human error, but that's crap.
